info.description: The LiveEdge(R) Compute platform provides complete control over the configuration and streaming capabilites of the Videon EdgeCaster. LiveEdge(R) Compute serves this API directly from the device so it can be consumed by the applications you deploy to it.
info.title: LiveEdge(R) Compute REST API

get.description: Get the list of encoders present in the device.
Get the list of audio encoders present in the device.

post.description: Create a new audio encoder with the specified settings.

get.description: Get the current audio encoder settings.

put.description: Update the current audio encoder settings.

get.description: Get the list of data encoders present in the device.

post.description: Create a new data encoder with the specified settings.

get.description: Get the current data encoder settings.

put.description: Update the current data encoder settings.

get.description: Get the list of video encoders present in the device.

post.description: Create new video encoder with the specified settings.

get.description: Get the list of sync groups.

post.description: Create sync group with the specified settings.

get.description: Get settings for the specified sync group.

put.description: Update settings for the specified sync group.

get.description: Get the list of input channels.
Get the list of streaming outputs.
Get the state of a single streaming output

put.description: Update the state of a single encoder streaming output

post.description: Run action for output, often supported by RTMP outputs, to support third-party API calls. This does not return anything directly but will cause status to change or service-specific data to populate.

get.description:
Get the SCTE-35 settings for the device.

These settings include ad duration.

put.description:
Update the SCTE-35 settings for the device.

These settings include ad duration.

post.description:
Insert splice markers to transport stream outputs starting now. The duration of the splice will be what is configured in
the scte35 endpoint. There will be at least a 4 second delay in splice start.

get.description: Get a list of storage devices.
Get storage device information for the specified device.

Get the system-wide settings for the device.

These settings include network settings, name, id and other attributes not related to encode or media transmission.

put.description:
Update the system-wide settings for the device.

These settings include network settings, name, id and other attributes not related to encode or media transmission.

get.description: Get the XML polling settings for the device.

put.description: Update the XML polling settings for the device.
